name: Eagle Materials Inc.
description: Eagle Materials Inc. is a leading provider of construction materials and products, primarily focused on the manufacturing of gypsum wallboard, cement, and concrete. Founded in 1963, the company has established a strong presence in the construction industry by supplying essential materials for residential and commercial building projects. Eagle Materials operates through several segments, including Gypsum Wallboard, Cement, Concrete and Aggregates, and Paperboard. With a commitment to quality and innovation, Eagle Materials has consistently expanded its production capabilities and geographic reach. The company places a strong emphasis on sustainable practices, ensuring that its operations minimize environmental impact while meeting the increasing demand for building materials. Eagle Materials is headquartered in Dallas, Texas, and has manufacturing facilities strategically located across the United States to effectively serve its customers. The company's mission is to provide high-quality materials that support the growth and development of infrastructure in communities throughout the country, while also delivering value to its shareholders.
